name: Chicken Kacchi
method: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. In a food processor, combine basil, Parmesan cheese, olive oil, pine nuts, garlic, salt, and pepper. Pulse until smooth. Drain spaghetti

name: Ilish Polao
ingredients: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces
method: In a large bowl, combine chicken, yogurt, lemon juice, cumin, cinnamon, cayenne, black pepper, ginger, and garlic. Stir to combine, then cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour or overnight. Preheat oven to 400°F. Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil. Thread chicken onto skewers and place on prepared baking sheet.

name: Special Lunch
ingredients: 1 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature
method: Preheat oven to 375°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt. In a large bowl, beat butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until creamy. Add eggs and vanilla extract and beat until well combined.
